globalwatchlist-summary: Special page to view a global watchlist
globalwatchlistsettings-summary: Special page to manage a global watchlist
globalwatchlist-api-error: An API error occurred while interacting with "$1":
globalwatchlist-filter-not-anon: Only edits made by logged-in users
globalwatchlist-getoptions-error: An error was detected while fetching stored user options. The defaults will be used instead.
globalwatchlist-grouped-timestamp: The timestamp of the latest change is shown for grouped changes
globalwatchlist-javascript-required: This special page requires JavaScript to work
globalwatchlist-markseen-allconfirm: Are you sure you want to mark all sites as seen?
globalwatchlist-must-login: Please log in to use the GlobalWatchlist special pages
globalwatchlist-notify-savingfailed: Failed to save settings. Please try again
globalwatchlist-notify-settingssaved: Your settings have been saved. [[Special:GlobalWatchlist|Return to global watchlist]].
globalwatchlist-option-confirmallsites: Require confirmation before marking all sites as seen
globalwatchlist-option-fastmode: Load faster, at the expense of less detail
globalwatchlist-prefs-settings: To set the preferences for the global watchlist, please visit [[Special:GlobalWatchlistSettings]].
globalwatchlist-settings-error-anon-bot: Anonymous users cannot make bot edits
globalwatchlist-settings-error-anon-mino: Anonymous users cannot make minor edits
globalwatchlist-settings-error-duplicate: The site "$1" is included multiple times.
globalwatchlist-settings-error-invalid-s: The site "$1" does not match a wiki where you have an attached CentralAuth account.
globalwatchlist-settings-error-too-many-: {{PLURAL:$1|$1 site was|$1 sites were}} chosen, which exceeds $2, the maximum number of allowed sites.
globalwatchlist-tour-addsite-description: Click above to add another row for a site.
globalwatchlist-tour-fastmode-descriptio: Fast mode results in faster rendering, but at the expense of less detail. Wikibase labels are not fetched, and a simple list of pages with changes is shown, without details about the editors or the edits themselves
globalwatchlist-tour-filters-description: The global watchlist does not have all of the filter options available for the normal watchlist. The available filters are for anonymous edits vs logged in users' edits, as well as filters for edits marked as minor edits or bot edits.
globalwatchlist-tour-help-description: More documentation is available on mediawiki.org
globalwatchlist-tour-intro-description: The GlobalWatchlist extension adds a special page, [[Special:GlobalWatchlist]], for viewing multiple watchlists at once. This page is used to set user preferences for the global watchlist.
globalwatchlist-tour-sitelist-descriptio: This is the list of sites that will be included in the global watchlist. Use the base URL for the site, e.g. en.wikipedia.org.
globalwatchlist-tour-types-description: Users can control what types of changes should be shown.
